about_the_game:
In a land shrouded in darkness, a young girl wielding sacred power embarks on a journey to save the world. Celestia's Light is a captivating 2D platform game that blends puzzle-solving, adventure, and action elements, inviting you into a magical world full of challenges and wonder.

As the chosen bearer of light, you'll play as a brave young heroine with flowing green hair, venturing through a beautiful yet perilous landscape. Each level is meticulously crafted, combining platforming challenges, puzzle exploration, and monster encounters to deliver a rich and engaging gaming experience.

Game Features:

Stunning visual style with soft color palettes and detailed pixel art

Unique lighting effects that create a dreamlike atmosphere

Challenging level design with diverse terrain mechanics and clever puzzles

Charming character design with fluid animations

Carefully crafted story about courage and hope

each scene is lovingly created and waiting to be explored. Along your journey, dodge or defeat adorable enemies,and ultimately dispel the darkness that envelops this land.

Experience this artistically crafted indie game as we chase the light and create your own adventure story. Begin this wonderful journey now and become the savior of this land!
